page.title: 07TRAVELLING IN HOATH
page.content:
If you have not got a car it is very difficult to travel unless you get a taxi or a bus but the problem is there aren't many buses going through Hoath. There are only 2 in the morning and 3 buses on the afternoon .On Saturdays there are 2 buses,1 in the morning at 10.16 and 1 in the afternoon comingback at 12.45 and there are not any buses on Sundays. .Sometimes buses go early and people get to the bus stop on time and the bus has gone.
The nearest railway stations are at Herne Bay,and Sturry.From Herne Bay station one way goes to London the opposite way goes to Margate.Sturry station goes to Ashford,Maidstone and London and the opposite way goes to Aylesham and Dover.
